For internal use only
Subject: Write-off letter: approval required
The chargeback team has reviewed the issuing case containing the following details:
Case ID:
Merchant name:
Terminal number:
Card number:
Operation date:
Operation amount/currency:
Disputed amount/currency:
As a result of the dispute cycle, case has been lost/Upon a thorough analysis of case details and transaction details the team has concluded that no dispute rights exist. [Choose the appropriate variant]
Our team has found that the transaction was performed by our merchant , who committed a mistake while servicing the cardholder and, according to the IPS rules, the acquirer bears the financial responsibility for the transaction. As such, we must debit the merchant’s account with the disputed amount.
However, is considered a V.I.P. which gives us license not to debit the merchant’s account in such cases. We request your final decision on the case – approve (not debit the merchant’s account) or decline (debit the merchant’s account).
Please review this case and let us know your resolution in your reply.
Sincerely yours,
Chargeback team
